com.software.reuze

Interface ac_i_Constraint

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ac_ConstraintNotEqual

    public interface ac_i_Constraint
    A constraint specifies the allowable combinations of values for a set of variables. Each constraint consists of a pair , where scope is a tuple of variables that participate in the constraint and rel is a relation that defines the values that those variables can take on.

    Note: Implementations of this interface define the different kinds of relations that constraints can represent.
    Author:
    Ruediger Lunde
